heading: Tonight
text: Mostly cloudy, some clearing developing in the southern valleys. Scattered to numerous snow showers through the north and mountains, more isolated in the south. Lows in the 20s, nearing 30 along Lake Champlain. Northwest wind 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 20 mph, higher gusts in the Champlain Valley and over the Greens.

heading: Monday
text: Mostly cloudy, some clearing developing in the southern valleys. Snow showers slowly retreating north, highest chances over the northern Greens. Highs from the upper 20s in the north increasing to near 40 in the south. Northwest wind at 5 to 15 mph, gusting 20 to 25 mph, higher gusts possible over the mountains.

heading: Monday Night
text: Scattered snow showers retreating north of Route 2 after midnight. Lows in the 20s, near 30 along Lake Champlain and in the southern valleys. Northwest wind 5 to 15 mph, gusting 20 to 25 mph over the mountains.
